text: The Aan River is a short river in the South Island of New Zealand. The river flows out of Lake Innes and into the sea on the southern coast of the South Island.New Zealand 1:50000 Topographic Map Series sheet CG06 – Long PointNew Zealand 1:50000 Topographic Map Series sheet CF06 – Lake Poteriteri The river may be reached on foot via the South Coast Track, which crosses it via a suspension bridge. ==References== Category:Rivers of Fiordland Category:Foveaux Strait
title: Aan River
